heading: HR00320
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES COMMITTEE ON HUMAN RIGHTS, TO INVESTIGATE, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, THE KILLING OF ARNOLD JARAMILLO AND 6 OTHERS IN AN ALLEGED ENCOUNTER WITH THE 41ST INFANTRY BATTALION UNDER THE 5TH INFANTRY DIVISION OF THE ARMED FORCES OF THE PHILIPPINES ON SEPTEMBER 4, 2014 IN GUINGUINABANG, LACUB, ABRA
